phrases: I have a condition.
Tell me all about Nana-san.
I want to hear about your feelings for her, and once I sort out me feelings about them...
Can you?
I met her in my second year of middle school...
So, what more can you determine from that?
Even with the condition of him telling you about Nana-san...
Why do not you try becoming a little more honest with your feelings?

Why cannot things go well between
the liar, you, and the crybaby, me?
You do not notice my styled hair
or my nice set of press-on nails.
Love is not about the unhappy tears that go along with it.
Those tears only leave my eyes dry and hurt me.
I love this destiny
between only you and only me.
I want to accept your hot feelings
and be taken by you forever.
Despite your uncute, tearful face and your shortness, I still love you.
Episode 18 ...
I asked Yano to tell me about Nana-san.
Because if I hear everything from Yano's lips..
Takahashi, next time I will properly talk about Nana-san.
So please meet with me again.
Takahashi, next time I will properly talk about Nana-san.
So please meet with me again.
Ah, shoot!
This is not even a date...
I will feel that...
You are late, Yano!
Sorry.
I had to find the movie tickets.
How many times do I have to tell you?
This is not a date!
Yeah...
But these tickets expire today, so...
But if you do not want to go...
They expire today?!
It would be such a waste!
Really Cheap
Really Cheap
This is bad...
Is not this just the same pattern as before?
You cannot watch a movie without getting some popcorn, right?
Yeah!
Salted butter popcorn.
please.
Caramel-flavored popcorn, please.
Hey!
There is no way caramel ever goes with popcorn.
Why not?
Salted butter popcorn is so boring.
If you want caramel, why do not you just get some candy?
Caramel candy and popcorn are completely different!
Exactly my point!
If they are so different, why do you have to combine them?
I do not get you at all!
It tastes good!
You are the one who is not making any sense, Yano!
Why do not you just get the salted butter popcorn, Yano?
I will get my own caramel-flavored...
Sounds good... two like that, please.
Certainly.
W-What?
I can pay for myself.
Do not worry about it.
No!
This is not a date, so I do not think it is right for you to pay for me.
I see.
Let us just split the cost.
Sign: Devastation
I will pay you back!
I will definitely pay you back tomorrow!
Yep.
There is like no one here.
With it like this, everything's going to go the way Yano wants it to...
Hey, this is pretty amazing.
Besides the two of us, there is only three other couples.
Is not it amaz... ing?
Just to let you know, I am giving up on you if you do not talk about her today.
I find it hard to believe you plan on talking seriously today, the way things are going.
Yeah, I know.
Yano instinctively has a habit of avoiding Nana-san whenever the topic comes up.
Well...
What is it?
Her name was Yamamoto Nana.
Her birthday was July 29th.
Her blood type was B.
And for her family...
She loved going out to sing karaoke.
She hated doing schoolwork.
Her favourite color was pink.
Her room was covered in hot pink everything.
She had a silly personality.
She would laugh a lot.
She would laugh at anything.
She would even laugh at things that were not funny.
She went out with ton of guys.
By the way, I was the 7th.
YOU-Umm, that is not really what I wanted to hear...
I did not want a profile.
I wanted more of, umm... you know?
Like, Yano's feelings for her...
Umm... was there anything that really left an impression on you after going out with her?
Something that left an impression?
Like how an udon noodle once came out of her nose?
An udon noodle came out of her nose?!
We were eating udon, and she started laughing really hard about something...
It came out?
It really freaked me out.
That is a little...
See?
I told you she was silly.
That is not what I meant...
Ah, the movie's starting.
Yano keeps giving me the slip...
This movie's...
I have seen it before...
And just like before... his left hand's in the exact same position...
Is he leaving half of the armrest for me?
But... why will not he hold my hand like he did before?
Hey, did you beat the boss yet?
I just beat it today!
You said you wanted her to come back to life, did not you?
Back then...
Do you remember?
Yeah.
How can I hate...
Everything...
I will forgive you for everything.
So, please...
I want you to come back to me alive.
If Nana-san was saved in that accident...
If she got out of it alive...
This is a really mean question...
I am sorry, I...
It is impossible to consider something like that in a normal sense...
There is no way I would keep going out with her.
Really...?
Actually... that is not true.
You said you wanted her to come back to life.
It is not true?
I just got caught up in this atmosphere.
Is not that how you really feel?
It is not.
You will not answer any of the things I am trying to ask you...
I am answering you!
Why do you keep running away from my questions?
I am not running!
You are!
What do you want from me?!
What do I have to say so you will understand?!
That is not what I am asking for.
It is.
Forget it!
There is something really big in Yano's heart, like a blockade.
It is impossible to consider something like that in a normal sense...
There is no way I would keep going out with her.
And every time I try to get around it, he gets so angry.
It is.
The more he acts like he does not see it... the more I can feel it become even stronger.
That existence of the person who was Nana-san...
I do not understand Yano's feelings anymore...
I have lost all my confidence...
There is no meaning left in any of this...
So it is like getting a game over before you can beat it?
It was not supposed to be like this...
I do not know what to do anymore.
I wonder if I just misunderstood things...
Mizu-chin's...
We Were There TOO!
Now, I wonder what will happen with the good luck between Yano and Nana, huh?
Yeah!
I wonder if those two will get back together?
Yeah.
If they really do break up, maybe I will go out with Yano instead!
Just kidding!
You are still talking about that...?
Mizu-chin, why do not you get yourself a boyfriend already?
You too, Taka-chan.
Please do not group us together.
I... have one now.
I did not hear about that!
Hey!
I did not hear a word about that!
I did not hear about that!
I never heard you had a boyfriend, Taka-chan!
Sorry, Mizu-chin.
W-Wait a sec here!
When was this?
When?
Where at?
Who is it?
Hey!
You know all those episodes I have not been in?
That is when I began to foster my love!
This is not the time for me to be competing with Nana!
I was kind of having my own Bokura ga Ita all this time!
Hey, is he older?
Younger?
Hey!
Well... I will leave that to your imagination.
I-Imagination?
What am I supposed to imagine?!
Do your best, Mizoguchi-san.
Kimi dake wo... atashi dake wo...
Hey!
Me too!
I want to sing like that, too!
I want a... a... Mizu-chin was there too!
What?
All alone?
Next time we hold this special corner, I will do it alone!
Someone, please come and take me away!
Bye...
The day before she died, we got into an argument.
It was over something really stupid.
Just a normal lover's quarrel.
Even though it is a day early, why do not we celebrate your birthday today?
What?
What is all this?
Well, you remember that new pasta place that opened last month?
You wanted to go, right?
I will let you eat as much as you want today.
Oh, yeah.
Actually, I just went there a couple days ago with a friend.
Me and Miki were bored one day, and these guys started hitting on us.
They were college students.
All we did was eat and talk, though.
Why did you go with them so willingly?
Huh?
Well, you know...
Mocchan, you have not called me at all since summer break started, so I was bored.
You never called, and whenever I called your house, you were never there.
I told you I was working over at Take's, did not I?
Huh?
I do not know about that.
I do not remember hearing about that.
Your little sister answered the phone, and I told her to tell you.
What?
You told Yuri?
When?
Do not go eating food some other guy buys for you!
You really are stupid, are not you?!
That is... what I said to her.
She got really mad.
Though I guess I snapped, too.
Even though she was always laughed about whatever I told her...
And just like that, we went our separate ways.
And then the accident happened.
I am no good when I have to remember her.
Because there is so much I regret.
It makes me hate myself.
I become painfully aware of how powerless I am.
I cannot stop asking myself questions, despite how futile they are...
You ask yourself futile questions...?
Like... what?
Takahashi, you may not believe me, but right now, you are the most important person to me.
And that is because I believe only one person can be most important to you at a time.
But if you do not believe me, then there is nothing I can do, I guess.
The women I always want the most run away from me.
Goodbye.
The women I always want the most run away from me.
When did I ever toss you away?!
Do not go anywhere.
And my girlfriend was a cheat.
I cannot stop asking myself questions, despite how futile they are...
Yano... everything I kept asking Yano...
Yano!
I really think Nana-san loved you a whole lot, Yano!
I am sure she is regretting it even now!
I am sure she is really regretting leaving you behind!
She could just die for making you so sad!
And I am sure, even now...
It is the same as that day...
Yano's heart was about to open up to me...
That was my chance...
I see...
So that is how it was...
Then, this time...
I will not make any mistakes...
It is all right.
Nana-san did not run from you.
She just passed you by accident.
She really did love you...
She never tossed you away.
Yano... answer her.
I am sure Nana-san's listening now.
I am sure she wants to apologize to you.
Answer her.
Answer Nana-san.
Then... why do not we both go searching for our own happiness?
I am sorry...
I could not make you happy.
Yano...
You pass.

umi wo aruita photograph

Kokorobosoku natteta hitori no heya ni suwatte
tooku ni kikoeru amaoto
Itsuka wasurete iku kimochi naraba
Konna ni kokoro kurushimenaide
Sotto sotto kobore...
The sunset stretches my shadow long and thin.
Its colors deeply dye my heart.
When you said this was probably the last time,
I held back my tears.
Memories are always too sad.
I just want to forget them all.
I continued to watch the last sunset
and your back that I would never see again.
You were always too kind
and even though now's too late...
Stop the sunset.
I do not want to lose you.
Like the sky enveloping me
your face would always look down at me.
Make it so the sun never sets...
The room we always lived in,
that photograph when we walked on the beach...
The promise we made will go unkept.
I became so lonely alone in my room,
listening to the distant rain.
If these are just some feelings I am going to forget one day
then do not torment my heart so much.
Gently, gently falling...
Episode 19 Preview...
Yano... you are pretty serious today.
It might be because...
I am actually nervous.
I thought you were going to tell me to go home.
I have decided that I want to start over.
Hey... what is it mean to fight to the bitter end for love?
Like how we never notice the seasons changing...
